function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate knowledge and prevention practice related to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease within the community","Mitigation":"Regular updates and education on COVID-19, promotion of prevention practices","Technologies":"Health communication technologies, media outreach","People":"Community members","Owner":"Health authorities, media organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate health protocols and measures taken by the government","Impact":"Significant increase in confirmed COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of stricter health protocols, restrictions on movement and gatherings","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, contact tracing technologies","People":"General population, government officials","Owner":"Government, health authorities"},{"Description":"Attention of countries focused on critical intervention for pandemic prevention and mitigation","Impact":"Potential lack of comprehensive global coordination in pandemic response","Mitigation":"Collaborative global efforts, joint research and resource-sharing","Technologies":"Global health databases, information sharing platforms","People":"International organizations, national governments","Owner":"International health authorities, research institutions"}]}
